review: The design is sleek and nice but remore control requires a little force when pressing the keypad...To me, Roku remote is much easier to use when scrolling, selecting and navigating through screens.
author: Abbie

review: Very easy to install and operate
author: Carl

review: I'm beyond happy I purchased the fire stick. Has about every single TV app available
author: Angie

review: Hi plugged in with my daughter watching movies on Amazon prime within 10 minutes.  Very easy to figure out with only about six steps in the instruction manual. Even somebody who is not very up to speed on the latest technology would not have a problem managing the set up of this item. I am going to be getting rid of my Google Chrome. It worked really well but because I have an Amazon prime account, this one serves me better and has a remote!
author: Sarah A Long

review: Free with 3 months of Sling, um, okay, duh!
author: andy powers

review: Love it. Easiest way to keep all your online streaming subscriptions in one place. Also I don't know of an easier way to browse Prime.
author: Red_Tile

review: Love the fire stick. so convenient and easy to use.
author: J. Geiger "yafine"
